subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: The Common Execution Architecture (CEA) is an attempt to create a reasonably small set of interfaces and schema to model how to execute a typical Astronomical application within the Virtual Observatory (VO). In this context an application can be any process that consumes or produces data.
